Smile Dental Care & Implant Centre is a Meerut based dental health care which is located in the center of the city & easily approachable by all means of transport.

The Center offers all form of routine dental treatments as well as advanced dental & dental related minor surgical procedures such as RCT, Scaling, Dental Bleaching, Conventional & Cosmetic Dentistry, Orthodontic treatment, Oral Surgeries, Dental Implants, Fixed & Removable dental prosthesis and Full mouth Read More..[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1439899240148{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-right: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;padding-left: 60px !important;background-color: #f6f6f6 !important;}”][stm_image_carousel images_to_show=”3″ images_to_show_tablet=”4″ images_to_show_mobile=”3″ images=”1299,1300,1301″ title=”Smile Dental care” title_color=”#4c4c4c” img_size=”130×100″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1443254699136{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;}” el_class=”base_background_color”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Our Advantages” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1439899872796{margin-bottom: 70px !important;}”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-3″ css=”.vc_custom_1443254710022{padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”][stm_icon_box title_font_size=”24″ title_font_weight=”300″ icon=”stm-icon-tooth-5″ icon_size=”63″ icon_height=”90″ title=”Certified Dental
Doctors”]

With over 18 years of dental experience and experience with implants, we are experts in all facets of dentistry.

[/stm_icon_box][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-3″ css=”.vc_custom_1443254718746{padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”][stm_icon_box title_font_size=”24″ title_font_weight=”300″ icon=”stm-icon-tooth-7″ icon_size=”52″ icon_height=”90″ title=”Encouraging Dental
Tourism & Insurance
Coverage” link=”||” title_color=”#ffffff”]

Our helpdesk provide all necessary information regarding dental tourism as well as about dental procedure covered under various Insurance policies.

[/stm_icon_box][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1443254731860{padding-bottom: 40px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-3″][stm_icon_box title_font_size=”24″ title_font_weight=”300″ icon=”stm-icon-tooth-4″ icon_size=”63″ icon_height=”90″ title=”Using Innovative

[/stm_icon_box][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1443254742860{padding-bottom: 40px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-3″][stm_icon_box title_font_size=”24″ title_font_weight=”300″ icon=”stm-icon-prick” icon_size=”54″ icon_height=”90″ title=”Guarantee Success
of Treatments”]

Most of our treatments are covered by a long term guarantee which will be discussed with you before beginning treatment.
